classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on top of large language models (LLMs). It specifically mentions building RAG systems, integrating LLMs, and working with frameworks like LangChain, Pinecone, and FAISS, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
